mutants.code:
import re

def extract_even_numbers(s):
    numbers = re.findall('', s)
    even_numbers = [int(num) for num in numbers if int(num) % 2 == 0]
    return even_numbers

mutants.original_line: even_numbers = [int(num) for num in numbers if int(num) % 2 == 0]
mutants.mutated_line: even_numbers = [int(num) for num in numbers if int(num) % 2 != 0]

import re

def extract_even_numbers(s):
    numbers = re.findall('\\b\\d+\\b', s)
    even_numbers = [int(num) for num in numbers if int(num) % 2 != 0]
    return even_numbers

mutants.mutated_line: even_numbers = [int(num) for num in numbers if int(num) * 2 == 0]
